diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL), Sigmoid Diverticulitis, Hypothyroidism
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient has a history of CLL and presented with symptoms including fevers, rigors, cough, and edema. Diagnostic imaging and lab tests were performed to evaluate symptoms. The left cervical lymph node biopsy was done as part of the workup for ongoing symptoms, and the discharge diagnosis reflects the primary issues identified.
